title: Large Language Models for Code Generation

limitations: Struggle with ambiguous or incomplete instructions

title: AI-based Crop Disease Detection
problem: Identifying plant diseases from leaf images
findings: CNN models achieve 97% accuracy under controlled conditions
limitations: Fails under variable lighting and real-world noise
